about_the_game:
The Project Amaranth Demo is the first of Project Amaranth's content releases. The demo will include a variety of content for players to enjoy with friends until Project Amaranth's August 2018 release. Through the demo, player's will begin to understand what Project Amaranth is all about. We hope you are as excited for the future as we are!

Features:

  • Nine elements: Nature, Earth, Fire, Water, Ice, Metal, Storm, Shadow, & Light.
  • 2 Attacks for each character.
  • A versatile map editor complete with all current assets, map connectivity, and a race gamemode maker!
  • Online Multiplayer and Race Online Multiplayer
  • A small playable area.
  • A small npc fighting arena.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Project Amaranth can be run on almost any computer.

short_description: Project Amaranth Demo is a taste of the Story-based dungeon crawler that Project Amaranth will become. In the demo the player will be able to explore the characters, dungeons, and world of planet Nona, in addition in an extensive map editor and a race gamemode.
